properties.entry: SELECT trans_prov FROM (SELECT MAPPROV * FROM ${1}) AS mprov WHERE tid = '${2}'
SELECT prov.tid FROM (SELECT * FROM ${1}) AS prov WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT subprov.tid FROM (SELECT MAPPROV * FROM ${1}) AS subprov WHERE prov.tid = subprov.tid AND trans_prov NOT IN (VALUES ${2}))
SELECT tid FROM (SELECT MAPPROV * FROM ${1}) p WHERE p.trans_prov IN (VALUES ${2})

SELECT prov.tid, ${1} FROM (SELECT * FROM ${2}) AS prov WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT subprov.tid FROM (SELECT MAPPROV * FROM ${2}) AS subprov WHERE prov.tid = subprov.tid AND trans_prov NOT IN (VALUES ${3}))
